name: audiobookshelf
description: Audiobookshelf is a self-hosted audiobook and podcast server. It supports multi-user access, metadata syncing, offline listening, and mobile-friendly playback. It integrates with clients like Jellyfin and supports OPDS.
features: Audiobook Server: Stream audiobooks and podcasts from your library. Personal audio platform.
Multi-User: Create accounts for family members with individual progress. Shared library.
Metadata Syncing: Automatic book information and cover art. Professional organization.
Offline Listening: Download for offline playback on mobile. Listen anywhere.
Progress Tracking: Resume exactly where you left off. Never lose your place.
Mobile Apps: Native apps for iOS and Android devices. Optimized experience.
OPDS Support: Compatible with various audiobook readers. Universal access.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your audiobook collection. Privacy guaranteed.
